product_title: x Converse Chuck Taylor® Low Top Sneaker
product_description: Stamped with an instantly recognizable heart logo, this classically cool sport sneaker is cut from tough canvas.
product_details_and_care:
Stamped with an instantly recognizable heart logo, this classically cool sport sneaker is cut from tough canvas. The product of a collaboration between Comme des Garçons PLAY and Converse, the shoe features classic Chucks styling with a playful, quirky twist thanks to the imagination of New York graphic artist Filip Pagowski and Comme des Garçon's own designer Rei Kawakubo.
Lace-up style
Textile upper and lining/rubber sole
Imported
Men's Shoes
Item #1127814
product_size_info: Runs large; order one size down.
